DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the early bronchodilating effect of SKP FlutiForm HFA pMDI compared to placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Single-dose Crossover Study to Evaluate the Early Bronchodilating Effect of FlutiForm HFA pMDI in Adult Subjects With Mild to Moderate Asthma
DOC.criteria: Subjects with documented history of mild to moderate asthma currently taking a stable dose of inhaled corticosteroid Participation in a prior FlutiForm study Smoking history within the last 12 months, Significant, nonreversible, pulmonary disease Lifethreatening asthma within the last year
